comments.comment: Well this lady really spoke with alot of sadness and anger for what Sirisena did and we all should agree. She is completely right and this is the truth. I would like to add something very important to this. THE PEOPLE OF THE COUNTRY HAS TO RESPECT THE LAW AND ORDER. THERE IS NOTHING CALLED BIG OR SMALL, lawyers from high Court and all district courts, the magistrates. THEY HAVE TAKE THE ACTIONS REGARDING ALL THE COURT CASES AGAINST ALL THOSE STARTING FROM mahinda's family members, his sons narmal, yoshitha, and the youngest of that currupted family including mahinda's wife, also his all the brothers, W. Weerawansa, Gamanpila, vasu, gunawardena, mahindananda, johnston, and the rest of the currupted from pohotuwa. UNP YES RANIL AND WHO EVER HAS DONE CURRUPTION AND HAVE CASES IN COURTS HAS TO BE COMPLETED WHY IS THIS DELAY THE MORE IT IS DELAYED THEY DO AGAIN. THE WHOLE COUNTRY IS WITH THOSE LAWYERS AND THE MAJISTRATE. THE TRUTH HAS TO BE BROUGHT TO THE PUBLIC. IF NOT THE ALL MIGHTY GOD IS WATCHING ALL THE HEARINGS AND YOU ALL WILL BE PUNISHED THE SAME IF THE JOB IS NOT DONE IN THE CORRECT WAY. THE CURSE IS ON THEY ALL ARE GETTING THE MAXIMUM FROM THE CURSES OF ALL THOSE FAMILY MEMBERS WHO LOST LOVELY ONES. FROM THAT PLANNED MURDERER'S. TODAY THE PEOPLE SAT AND PLANNED BY PHONE OR BY MEETING ARE ALL BEEN CURSED AND PUNISHED BY THE ALL MIGHTY GOD TILL DEATH. PERIOD.....
